net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.features.global

Class SimpleColorHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.semanticmetadata.lire.imageanalysis.features.global.SimpleColorHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Extractor, FeatureVector, GlobalFeature, LireFeature

    public class SimpleColorHistogram
extends java.lang.Object
implements GlobalFeature
    This class provides a simple color histogram for content based image retrieval. Number of bins is configurable, histogram is normalized to 8 bit per bin (0-255).
    Defaults are given in the final fields. Available options are given by the enums.


    Date: 14.05.2008
    Time: 09:47:10

    Author:
    Mathias Lux, mathias@juggle.at
